meanings.definition: Constituting number five in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: She was the fifth person in line for the ride.
meanings.sent2: The fifth book on the shelf is my favorite.
meanings.sent3: The fifth time he told the joke, we all burst out laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her fifth attempt at baking a cake finally turned out delicious.
meanings.sent5: The fifth star from the left shone the brightest in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: He ate a fifth of the pizza all by himself.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divided into fifths for each guest.
meanings.sent3: The team won the game by a fifth of a point.
meanings.sent4: She only had a fifth of the puzzle left to complete.
meanings.sent5: A fifth of the class chose to study science as their major.

meanings.definition: The interval between one note and another five notes higher or lower in a diatonic scale.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a beautiful melody with a perfect fifth.
meanings.sent2: In the song, the chorus starts with a fifth above the main note.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed a fifth higher than usual, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The birds chirped in fifths, creating a harmonious tune.
meanings.sent5: The choir sang the hymn with a powerful fifth that resonated throughout the church.
